wiki.content: Jared Leto told Musicradar.com about the song (Source Kings and Queens Songfacts):"In many ways, a cornerstone for this record. Half of (the song) was written in America and the other half was written in South Africa, which has proved to be a very lucky and magical place for the band. I wrote the first verse just as I was headed out the door for South Africa, and the minute I touched down I finished the rest of it. I took that as a good omen. Musically, it was a bit of a beast in that it was originally eight minutes long, so we had to do some trimming. I decided to change the chord structure of the bridge and just let the pieces fall where they may." User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Jared Leto told Musicradar.com about the song (Source Kings and Queens Songfacts):"In many ways, a cornerstone for this record. Half of (the song) was written in America and the other half was written in South Africa, which has proved to be a very lucky and magical place for the band. I wrote the first verse just as I was headed out the door for South Africa, and the minute I touched down I finished the rest of it. I took that as a good omen. Musically, it was a bit of a beast in that it was originally eight minutes long, so we had to do some trimming.

track.name: Kings and Queens
comments: Perhaps, the hit most heat from 30STM.
This is the song of my life!
Was originally 8 mins long. I wish they made it the extended version :\
Jared Leto rocks AND IS SUPER SEXY.

i got to say, jared leto is pretty handsome.  do you think he would be interested in a late 30 something with two kids and a husband that is soon to not be a husband.  wouldn't that be an awesome turn around to my current situation.
just wonderful. one of the best songs <3
This song is ok, but its practically the only song ever playing on alt/rock music channels, and eventually you get a sort of Kings and Queens build up - anyone else know what I mean?
Great song! I just love the ending
